attributes.action: The uk govment ought to bring back IMPERIAL MEASURES and ditch this euro busines
attributes.additional_details: how many "litres" to a centimetre?????? don't tell me 1.4 or smoething i dunno. It was simpler when 1 foot = 12 icnh
attributes.background: You dont thimk in kilowhatsits and "metres" when you need to do a measure, you see a large FEET AND INCH ruler in your mind that tells you how long.... we the BRITISH peopl have had enought of UNelecTED burocrats tellin us what to do and how to measure our lengths. i miss the good old british impere
